data.title: Urban Soul Band
data.text:
Urban Soul is a Los Angeles based entertainment entity with a wide variety of configurations. Urban Soul can be a solo act up through a ten piece show band including a horn section. Urban Soul is made up of veteran musicians from all over the country bringing a multitude of musical facets to the table. This allows Urban Soul to deliver a large repertoire of musical styles appropriate for any occasion. When combined, Urban Soul brings well over 100 years of musical experience to your event. Urban Soul can supply a complete service to your event including lighting, sound reinforcement, which can be scaled to any size venue. Urban Soul can also deliver DJ, Karaoke, and Master of Ceremonies services.

We appreciate your time viewing our information and listening to our audio samples. We look forward to hearing from you in the near future about booking Urban Soul for your event.
